title: Jump Start Brazilian Portuguese - Lesson 29: 32 Common Informal Expressions

media:group.media:title: Jump Start Brazilian Portuguese - Lesson 29: 32 Common Informal Expressions
media:group.media:description: In this next-to-last lesson in my Jump Start Brazilian Portuguese series, I present 32 very common informal and slang expressions in Brazilian Portuguese. For each, I provide an explanation or definition, along with English equivalent expressions and examples in Portuguese.
